00010 static void
00011 TestFreeImageAlgorithms_LinearScaleTest(CuTest* tc)
00012 {
00013         double min_found, max_found;
00014 
00015         char *file = IMAGE_DIR "\\8bit_test.png";
00016 
00017         FIBITMAP *dib = FreeImageAlgorithms_LoadFIBFromFile(file);
00018         FIBITMAP *scaled_dib = FreeImageAlgorithms_LinearScaleToStandardType(dib, 0, 0, &min_found, &max_found);  
00019 
00020         FreeImage_Unload(dib);
00021         FreeImage_Unload(scaled_dib);
00022 
00023         CuAssertTrue(tc, min_found == 152.0);
00024         CuAssertTrue(tc, max_found == 240.0);
00025 }
00026 
00027 
00028 CuSuite* DLL_CALLCONV
00029 CuGetFreeImageAlgorithmsLinearScaleSuite(void)
00030 {
00031         CuSuite* suite = CuSuiteNew();
00032 
00033         SUITE_ADD_TEST(suite, TestFreeImageAlgorithms_LinearScaleTest);
00034 
00035         return suite;
00036 }
